title.rendered: Dallas AC Repair Services: 4 Signs You Need a New Air Conditioner

content.rendered:
If you live in Dallas, you need air conditioning virtually throughout the year. If your AC unit goes out in your home in the Dallas summer, it can feel like the end of the world. And yet, air conditioning maintenance is something that’s easily and frequently overlooked. If your AC is old or it’s not cooling the way it should, it might be time to call Dallas AC repair services.

It will guarantee you peace of mind, so far as your home air conditioning is concerned. At the same time, it will save you money in the long run on energy costs and repairs. In this post, we are going to discuss some signs that indicate you may need a new air conditioner.

4 Signs You Need To Call Dallas AC Repair And Replacement

Not sure whether or not you need to buy a brand-new AC right now? Here are a few common signs to keep an eye on: 

AC is creating too much moisture

All air conditioners generate a little bit of moisture, but it’s normal and usually nothing to worry about. However, if the moisture is too much or you notice leakage around the unit, there might be a leak in the refrigerant. This can lead the AC to underperform, and cause severe health risks since moisture can lead to mold and mildew.

AC is not blowing cool air

If you turn on your AC, and warm air comes out, something is obviously wrong with the unit. It could be an issue of clogged ductwork or piping, or it could be a leak in the refrigerant.

In this case, call Dallas AC repair experts for a professional opinion. They might be able to repair it, but if the damage is irreparable, you may need to buy a new system.

AC smells foul or rotten

It goes without saying that your AC should not be making your home smell bad. If the air circulated by your system is anything but clean-smelling, it could any of the following reasons:

  • A leak in your refrigerant line
  • Dead rodents, birds, or critters are stuck in the AC (if you smell a rotten egg odor)
  • One or more AC components are burning (if you smell a burning odor)
  • Accumulation of water in the drip lines, drain pan, or ducts (if you smell a moldy odor)
  • Leakage of gas, like methyl mercaptan within the AC (if you smell gas)

So, if you smell something funky in your AC unit, call Dallas AC repair professionals right away. Whatever is causing the awful smell in your air conditioner, it certainly needs immediate attention. 

AC is making weird sounds

Is your AC unit making more noise than usual? Do you notice any chattering, squeaking, or grinding noises coming out of the system? These strange sounds generally indicate that the air conditioner has become too old. If you’re experiencing this, consider calling Dallas AC repair experts for an evaluation of the unit.

Call Us For 100% Satisfaction Guarantee on Dallas AC Repair and Installation

If your existing AC is giving you problems, you will either need to repair it or get a new one. Let us help you determine the most cost-effective option. Speak to us by calling at 866-836-2341 or contact us online to schedule an appointment.
